hooks.command: transcript_path=$(cat | jq -r '.transcript_path'); last_message=$(tail -1 "$transcript_path" | jq -r '.message.content[0].text // empty'); notification_json=$(jq -n --arg msg "$last_message" '{type: "agent-turn-complete", "last-assistant-message": $msg}'); "$HOME/.config/claude/notify.py" "$notification_json" >/dev/null 2>&1 &
